stories.Title: Google's latest move in AI research
stories.Description: With the goal of transforming industries and improving lives, DeepMind merges with Google's Brain team to accelerate AI progress.
stories.Tweet: Google's latest move in AI research 📦 With the goal of transforming industries and improving lives, DeepMind merges with Google's Brain team to accelerate AI progress. #google https://www.theverge.com/2023/4/20/23691468/google-ai-deepmind-brain-merger

stories.Title: Bard is your new coding companion
stories.Description: Developers can now generate code, debug it, and even write functions for Google Sheets using Google's AI chatbot.
stories.Tweet: Bard is your new coding companion 📦 Developers can now generate code, debug it, and even write functions for Google Sheets using Google's AI chatbot. #google https://www.theverge.com/2023/4/21/23692517/google-ai-bard-chatbot-code-support-functions-google-sheets

stories.Title: ChatGPT is actually expensive
stories.Description: Writing a poem or a funny story for your co-workers using OpenAI's chatbot could cost the company up to $700,000 per day.
stories.Tweet: ChatGPT is actually expensive 📦 Writing a poem or a funny story for your co-workers using OpenAI's chatbot could cost the company up to $700,000 per day. #chatgpt https://www.businessinsider.com/how-much-chatgpt-costs-openai-to-run-estimate-report-2023-4

stories.Title: Humane’s AI-powered personal assistant
stories.Description: Unveiling the most innovative wearable gadget with AI-powered features, this startup founded by former Apple employees is creating a buzz in the tech industry.

stories.Title: Hit the road with Tesla's new update
stories.Description: Tesla owners can now plan their trips straight from their mobile app, thanks to the long-awaited addition of a trip planner feature.

stories.Title: Volkswagen keeps expanding outside of Europe
stories.Description: Canada is providing substantial funding to the automaker for the construction of its first North American battery plant.

stories.Title: Hyundai is aiming for the moon
stories.Description: An autonomous lunar exploration rover is being designed by the company in collaboration with Korean aerospace partners, with the goal of navigating the moon's surface by 2027.
stories.Tweet: Hyundai is aiming for the moon 📦 An autonomous lunar exploration rover is being designed by the company in collaboration with Korean aerospace partners, with the goal of navigating the moon's surface by 2027. #hyundai https://electrek.co/2023/04/20/hyundai-motor-group-autonomous-rover-designed-to-explore-the-moon/

stories.Title: The excitement for Apple's wearables keeps growing
stories.Description: According to reports, early testers of Apple's new Reality Pro headset, which is rumored to be announced in June, are "blown away."

stories.Title: A new app is coming with iOS 17
stories.Description: Apple is reportedly working on an app codenamed "Jurassic" designed to help users keep track of their activities through journaling.

stories.Title: A world without checkmarks
stories.Description: With verified checkmarks from legacy accounts being removed, "verification" is now only available to subscribers of Twitter Blue.
